question: Which film has won the Golden Bear Award at the 67th Berlin International Film Festival-2017?
explanation: The Hungarian drama film \"On Body and Soul\" has won the Golden Bear Award at the 67th Berlin International Film Festival. At Berlin it also won the  International Federation of Film Critics (FIPRESC) Prize and the Prize of the Ecumenical Jury. The film is directed by Hungarian writer-director Ildiko Enyedi.
